author: Rebekah Valentine
description: Among Us developer Innersloth has found a reference to its game in the new chapters of Deltarune, sparking a little bit of friendly back-and-forth between Innersloth and Deltarune developer Toby Fox on social media.
title: Among Us Devs Found a Reference to Their Game in Deltarune, Toby Fox Responds

author: Erik Adams
description: There’s a funny idea at the core of Deep Cover, but it grows dully repetitive well before it ends.
title: Deep Cover Review

author: Erik Adams
description: Revival is a somewhat clever, not-quite-zombie show that could use a clearer take on living (and undying) in a small town.
title: Revival Season 1 Review

author: Eric Song
description: The best controller for PlayStation 5.
title: The PS5 Dualsense Edge Deal Is Still Available After PlayStation's Days of Play Sale Ended

author: Chris Reed
description: This is a buildable vending machine that, once you put it together, actually spits out a LEGO minifigure when you put in a plastic coin and turn the knob.
title: We Build LEGO Minifigure Vending Machine, a Working Toy Delivery System

author: Jacob Kienlen
title: The Animated How to Train Your Dragon Movies Get Discounted as the Live-Action Film Hits Theaters

author: Eric Song
description: This PC won't break the bank and can comfortably play most games at 1080p.
title: The HP Omen 16L RTX 4060 Gaming PC Drops to $799, Great for Budget Gamers

author: Myles Obenza
description: Massive Batman, massive villain.
title: The Latest Absolute Batman Comic Is Available to Read Now and Introduces a Massive Villain

author: Lloyd Coombes
description: You can still buy Magic: The Gathering Final Fantasy Secret Lair drops from third party sellers, if you're willing to pay the inflated price.
title: Where to Buy Magic: The Gathering x Final Fantasy Secret Lair Now That WOTC Has Sold Out

author: Eric Song
description: Currently the only 65" OLED TV you can get at this price.
title: The 65" Panasonic Z85 4K OLED Smart TV with Amazon Fire TV Drops to Under $1,000

author: Matthew Adler
description: Toy Battle is a quick two-player battle board game with unique troop abilities and eight distinct game boards that keep each match fresh and replayable.
title: Toy Battle Board Game Review: A Solid Strategy Game for Two Players

author: Hannah Hoolihan
description: From Ravensburger to Springbok to Rokr, here are the best puzzle brands to check out in 2025.
title: The Best Jigsaw Puzzle Brands for Quality Puzzling in 2025

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine 2 has sold a huge 7 million copies in less than a year, publisher Focus Entertainment has announced, so you can see why Space Marine 3 was greenlit so soon.
title: Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine 2 Sells 7 Million in Less Than a Year — and You Can See Why Space Marine 3 Was Confirmed So Soon

author: Michael Peyton
description: Ryan Reynolds breaks down the superhero inspirations behind his new Nat Geo series including how Deadpool is basically an axolotl and Wolverine could have been a honey badger.
title: Ryan Reynolds Says Wolverine ‘Could Have Just As Easily’ Been a Honey Badger

author: Jesse Schedeen
description: Warner Bros. and DC Studios have announced a Mister Miracle animated series to be helmed by Lanterns producer and prolific comic book scribe Tom King.
title: DC Announces Mister Miracle Animated Series From Lanterns Producer Tom King

author: Michael Cripe
description: Moviemaking icon Mel Brooks and Amazon MGM Studios have published a special trailer to announce that Spaceballs 2 is moving full steam ahead with plans to premiere in 2027.
title: Spaceballs 2 Will See Rick Moranis Return as Dark Helmet as Mel Brooks Sequel Trailer Plots a Course for 2027

author: Vikki Blake
description: Dune: Awakening is back online after patch 1.1.0.13 was rolled out. Here's what's changed.
title: Dune: Awakening Is Back Online After Scheduled Maintenance — Here's What's New

author: Lex Briscuso
description: If you were wondering what the legal definition of Shrek is, the Disney / Universal lawsuit against AI company Midjourney confirms exactly what it is.
title: History In the Making: Disney and Midjourney Lawsuit Finally Gives Us the Legal Definition of Shrek

author: Rebekah Valentine
description: After playing 15 minutes of Towa and the Guardians of the Sacred Tree this weekend, I'm far more interested than I initially expected to be in Towa's take on the roguelite genre...though I'm going to need waaay more than 15 minutes to get good at it.
title: Towa and the Guardians of the Sacred Tree First Hands-on Preview: Twin-Stick Hades

author: Christian Wait
description: Prices are finally stabilizing for Pokémon TCG: Destined Rivals. Here’s what’s holding value and what’s worth grabbing while you can.
title: Here's The Top 10 Most Expensive Pokémon Cards in Destined Rivals

author: Ryan McCaffrey
description: Renown’s crunchy combat has a lot of potential in a genre not known for making close combat an elaborate affair. Meanwhile, the basic and sometimes mundane gathering and building game that you have to trudge through to get to cool stuff is very raw and still has a ways to go to meet the quality standard of the games it hopes to compete with.
title: Renown Has Medieval Survival Promise but Has a Lot of Work Left to Do

author: Hannah Hoolihan
description: Gears of War: Reloaded is now available to preorder for PS5 in a physical format and digitally for Xbox, PS5, and PC. It's set to release on August 26.
title: Gears of War: Reloaded - Here's What Comes in Each Edition

author: Lex Briscuso
description: Now here’s an interesting filmmaker-studio twist. The Witch and Nosferatu maestro Robert Eggers is being eyed to helm a remake of A Christmas Carol at Warner Bros., and he has his sights set on none other than Willem Dafoe to play his Ebenezer Scrooge.
title: Nosferatu Maestro Robert Eggers May Write and Direct a Christmas Carol Remake for Willem Dafoe to Play Scrooge

author: Jim Vejvoda
description: “We’re deeply grateful to Paramount+ for the chance to complete our five-season mission, just as we envisioned it, alongside our extraordinary cast and crew," the showrunners said in a statement.
title: Star Trek: Strange New Worlds Renewed for Fifth and Final Season

author: Rebekah Valentine
description: With Deltarune chapters 3 and 4 out last week, players have found an absolutely fascinating bit of dialogue that's almost impossible to get, as it requires beating all four chapters of Deltarune on PlayStation without earning a single trophy.
title: Deltarune Has a Hidden Message on PlayStation for Anyone Who Manages to Earn No Trophies at All

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: MindsEye’s troubled launch has continued with reports that the developer is canceling sponsored streams last minute, and some players are securing refunds. The developer has now issued a statement, saying it is "heartbroken" over the game's difficulties.
title: MindsEye Dev 'Heartbroken' Amid Troubled Launch as Players Report Success With Refunds and Sponsored Streams Are Canceled Last Minute

author: Rebekah Valentine
description: During Summer Game Fest last week, you’d be forgiven for having overlooked Towa and the Guardians of the Sacred Tree. It’s a brand new rogue-like that got a very brief trailer and little fanfare. But its unusual development story may make Towa one of the more interesting games that appeared during the show.
title: How Hades Directly Inspired Bandai Namco's First-Ever Roguelite

author: Rebekah Valentine
description: The Nintendo Switch 2 is the fastest-selling Nintendo hardware in the U.S. in the four days following its release, according to a statement obtained by IGN from Nintendo. It's outselling the OG Switch 2-to-1 globally.
title: Nintendo Switch 2 Outselling the OG Switch 2-to-1 Across the Globe

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: Konami had a big announcement ready for its Konami Press Start Live showcase: a Silent Hill 1 remake from Bloober Team, developer of the Silent Hill 2 remake.
title: Silent Hill 1 Remake Officially in Development at Bloober Team, Konami Has Announced

author: Jacob Kienlen
description: Demystify your disc collection.
title: What’s the Actual Difference Between 4K and Blu-Ray?

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: Konami is bringing back Metal Gear multiplayer with Metal Gear Solid Delta: Snake Eater, but don’t expect it to play like Metal Gear Online.
title: Metal Gear Solid Delta: Snake Eater Has an Online Multiplayer Mode Called Fox Hunt With Completely Different Gameplay Than Metal Gear Online

author: Michael Cripe
description: Amazon Prime Video has found three new cast members in Andrew Richardson, Zubin Varla, and Adam Young for The Lord of the Rings: The Rings of Power Season 3.
title: The Lord of the Rings: The Rings of Power Adds 3 New Cast Members as Work on Season 3 Continues

author: Ryan McCaffrey
description: Developer Berry Bite and publisher HypeTrain have announced Humblets, the upcoming cozy co-op adventure for PC set in what looks like an absolutely delightful procedural world full of colorful locations, adorable pets, and a magic deck of cards to challenge friends and NPC foes alike.
title: Cozy Co-op Adventure 'Humblets' Announced for PC

author: Erik Adams
description: Egerton burns brightly throughout Apple TV+’s uneven, entertaining crime thriller Smoke.
title: Smoke Review

author: Vikki Blake
description: Metal Gear Solid publisher Konami is back with a bang, and to prove it, it hosted a livestream showcase on June 12 called Konami Press Start Live. Here's everything announced.
title: Konami Press Start Live June 2025: Everything Announced

author: Tom Phillips
description: The BBC has announced a new Doctor Who spin-off series set to debut on UK children's channel CBeebies, amid a turbulent time for the broadcaster's flagship sci-fi show.
title: Doctor Who Animated Spin-Off Announced While Main Show's Future Unclear, Leaving Fans Wondering Who Will Play the Doctor — or if They'll Even Appear

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: This week’s new Superman trailer revealed lots of fresh footage, including a brief shot showing Superman himself holding a weird, alien-looking baby. The identity of the baby has yet to be officially revealed, and DC Universe steward James Gunn has yet to confirm anything about the character. But it turns out we knew who it was all along thanks to a recently released children’s book.
title: If You’re Wondering Who Is the Weird Baby in the New Superman Trailer, a Children's Book Has Spilled the Beans

author: Vikki Blake
description: Nintendo has deployed an update for Splatoon 3, improving how it looks and runs on Nintendo Switch 2. Check out the update 10.0.0. patch notes.
title: Splatoon 3's 10.0.0 Update Is Here — Check Out the Patch Notes

author: Dan Stapleton
title: The Alters Review

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: Orlando Bloom has discussed the possibility of reprising his iconic role as Legolas in Lord of the Rings: The Hunt for Gollum, and has a clear idea of how the character would work.
title: Orlando Bloom Says He'd Love to See Legolas in Lord of the Rings: The Hunt for Gollum, but 'AI Would Have to Come Into Play'

author: Christian Wait
description: As of June 11, sealed Pokémon cards are on sale, Humble Choice includes Warhammer 40K Boltgun and Soul Reaver Remastered, and Samsung is offering $100 off plus up to $300 in credit on new Smart AI Monitors. Preorders and discounts live now.
title: Deals For Today: Physical Game Discounts And New Samsung Monitors

author: Vikki Blake
description: The PC version of Stellar Blade only launched yesterday, June 11, but it's already Sony's biggest single-player Steam launch ever.
title: Stellar Blade Only Released On PC Yesterday, But It's Already One of Sony's Biggest Steam Launches Ever

author: Vikki Blake
description: The composer behind HBO's smash-hit The Last of Us TV show has revealed there'll be "at least two more seasons," strongly suggesting Season 4 is on the way.
title: The Last of Us TV Show Composer Strongly Suggests Season 4 Is Coming

author: Lloyd Coombes
description: You can save 50% on Final Fantasy Rebirth for PS5 right now, but the sale ends soon.
title: Save Big on 2024 GOTY Contender Final Fantasy 7 Rebirth

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: Nintendo Switch 2 is still only being sold via lottery in Japan, which means you can’t just walk into a store and buy one. This huge demand has prompted a flood of Switch 2 consoles to hit online marketplaces like Mercari Japan over the past week. Although price gouging and scalping have been widely criticized, Switch 2 listings and the frantic comments they attract from users desperate to get their hands on Nintendo’s latest console have attracted parody listings of... light switches.
title: Nintendo Switch 2 Mania in Japan Prompts Parody Listings for Light Switches Made From Cardboard

author: Vikki Blake
description: The Screen Actors Guild - American Federation of Television and Radio Artists (SAG-AFTRA) confirmed it had reached a "tentative agreement" on the interactive media contract earlier this week, potentially bringing to an end almost a year of industrial action across the video game industry. Now SAG-AFTRA has formally suspended strike action as of noon PT yesterday (June 11).
title: SAG-AFTRA Suspends Video Game Voice Actor and Performer Strike, Bringing Industrial Action to an End After Almost a Year

author: Eric Van Allen
description: Ever looked at the bulky helmets and garb of Elden Ring Nightreign's Nightfarers? Well, wonder no more, as one YouTuber has taken the mask off and shown the little details hiding underneath the coverings of Elden Ring Nightreign's cast.
title: Ever Wondered What's Behind the Mask of Elden Ring Nightreign's Characters? Here's Your Answer

author: Erik Adams
description: FUBAR's second season is a decent, yet ultimately underwhelming follow up to an otherwise entertaining spy-adventure series.
title: FUBAR Season 2 Review

description: Check out our updated list of all current codes for Flashpoint: Worlds Collide.
title: Flashpoint: Worlds Collide Codes (June 2025)

description: Need a last-minute Father's Day gift?
title: How to Gift a Disney+ Streaming Subscription to Someone

description: Alienware's new flagship PC is paired with Nvidia's most powerful GPU.
title: The Alienware Area-51 GeForce RTX 5090 Gaming PC Drops Back Down to Under $5,000

description: Today's gaming discounts span all corners of the digital landscape, from creature-collecting epics to emotionally loaded indies and big-name brawlers.
title: AU Deals: Serious EOFY Savings on Consoles, Premium Controllers, PS Portals, Pokémon Legends, and More!
